title: Request Size Limit
description: Enforces a maximum size in bytes of the incoming request.

export.description: The name of the exported type

maxSizeInBytes.description: The maximum size of the request in bytes

trustContentLengthHeader.description: If true, the policy will reject any request with a `content-length` header in excess of `maxSizeInBytes` bytes value, but will not verify the actual size of the request. This is more efficient and offers slightly better memory usage but should only be used if you trust/control the clients calling the gateway to send an accurate content-length. If false, the gateway will actually verify the request size and reject any request with a size in excess of the stated maximum.
